ModMetaData.name: StunWeapons
ModMetaData.author: TheHolyEpicPenguin
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds several weapons, including 3 ranged weapons, a baton, and a turret, with unique non-lethal capabilities to make combat more interesting while maintaining a vanilla-eqsue experience.\n\nFor version 1.2 or 1.3.
